nodes.text: Denish Wraive was a male soldier in the New Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry. During the Galactic Civil War, Wraith was selected by the New Republic pilot Wyl Lark to fly an airspeeder in a makeshift squadron, due to a shortage of pilots following an attack by Colonel Soran Keize's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. Wraive then served as the squadron leader for Wild Squadron.
Denish Wraive first appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, the second instalment of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy written by Alexander Freed.
